alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Marion County through 700 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ocala Airport, or 8 miles northeast of Rainbow Lakes Estates, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Sparr, Ocala Airport, Anthony, Reddick and Lowell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
